name: 12 Days Till Christmas
description:
Survive through 12 hordes of evil snowmen and other foes while defending a lone Christmas tree in this tower defense-style roguelike where you either unlock a new tower or new enemy every day. (WARNING: WebGL visuals might look slightly off, downloadable version is strongly recommended)

CONTROLS:

WASD = movement

LEFT CLICK = shoot (when unlocked)

RIGHT CLICK = place tower

SPACE = continue from present menu

There may or may not be a devlog on this Youtube channel sooner or later:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQpBjOgk7gAAj6IHZ3ytKFw
